annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 16, 1988, D.C. Law 7-93, § 3(b), 35 DCR 721

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 3 of Cable Television Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-409, July 15, 2002, 49 DCR 7280).

annoGroup.heading: Short Title
annoGroup.annotation: Short title: The first section of D.C. Law 7-93 provided: “That this act may be cited as the ‘Cable Television Communications Act of 1981 Amendment Act of 1987’.”

annoGroup.heading: Delegation of Authority
annoGroup.annotation: Delegation of authority pursuant to D.C. Law 7-93, the Cable Television Communications Act of 1981 Amendment Act of 1987, see Mayor’s Order 90-137, October 17, 1990.
